charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)
18:553.F  EXPORTATION OF STOLEN MOTOR VEHICLES AND PARTS 18 USC 553(a)(1)(2-7)
18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment: 1 MONTH, as to counts 1 and 8, with all such terms to run concurrently. Supervised Release: 3 YEARS with conditions, as to counts 1 and 8, with all such terms to run concurrently. Restitution: $38,821.01. Special Assessment: $200.00 ($100.00 as to each count). Mittimus is stayed until 11/18/2014. Defendant to self surrender to the U.S. Marshals Service for this district before 10:00 a.m. on 11/18/2014.
